thread.title: Paire upsets Nishikori to advance to Japan Open final
thread.title_full: Paire upsets Nishikori to advance to Japan Open final - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Paire upsets Nishikori to advance to Japan Open final
text: Photo: Eugene Hoshiko, AP Benoit Paire of France returns a shot against Kei Nishikori of Japan during their singles semifinal match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. Benoit Paire of France returns a shot against Kei Nishikori of... TOKYO (AP) — Unseeded Benoit Paire of France beat defending champion Kei Nishikori 1-6, 6-4, 6-2 Saturday to advance to the Japan Open final where he faces top-seeded Stan Wawrinka. Benoit Paire of France returns a shot against Kei Nishikori of Japan during their singles semifinal match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. Benoit Paire of France returns a shot against Kei Nishikori of... TOKYO (AP) — Unseeded Benoit Paire of France beat defending champion Kei Nishikori 1-6, 6-4, 6-2 Saturday to advance to the Japan Open final where he faces top-seeded Stan Wawrinka.
